description: Returns the rate limits per model for a project.

parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. The default is 100.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `after` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with obj_foo, your subsequent call can include after=obj_foo in order to fetch the next page of the list.
parameters.name: after

parameters.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `before` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, beginning with obj_foo, your subsequent call can include before=obj_foo in order to fetch the previous page of the list.
parameters.name: before

items.description: Represents a project rate limit config.

batch_1_day_max_input_tokens.description: The maximum batch input tokens per day. Only present for relevant models.

id.description: The identifier, which can be referenced in API endpoints.

max_audio_megabytes_per_1_minute.description: The maximum audio megabytes per minute. Only present for relevant models.

max_images_per_1_minute.description: The maximum images per minute. Only present for relevant models.

max_requests_per_1_day.description: The maximum requests per day. Only present for relevant models.

model.description: The model this rate limit applies to.

object.description: The object type, which is always `project.rate_limit`
